video.title: The Boy Who Stole Valve - The Half Life 2 Leak
video.description:
Imagine spending five years developing a video game only to have it stolen in the final hours. This is the story of the boy who hacked Valve and stole the source code of Half Life 2 and an early copy of Steam.

Visual Sources:
